pci_database_add_description1: Create a database service available in your Public Cloud project. If you would like to use a private network that does not yet exist, please create
pci_database_add_step1_description: Select a database type to suit your needs
pci_database_add_nodes_count_tooltip: The number of nodes depends on the solution you have chosen. In the beta test version, this number cannot be changed at the creation step.
pci_database_add_network_mode_public_inc: The solution selected is not compatible with public networks.
pci_database_add_network_mode_private_in: The solution selected is not compatible with private networks.
pci_database_add_privateNetwork_descript: By default, databases have a public network. You can also add a private network, but you will lose the configuration you have just set up.
pci_database_add_subnet_description: You can create a subnet, but you will lose your current configuration.
pci_database_add_create_database_success: Your service is being created, and will be available in a few minutes.
pci_database_add_create_database_error: An error occurred while creating your service. Please try the operation again later: {{message}}
pci_database_add_name_pattern_rule: May contain numbers, letters, underscores, dashes and full stops only.
pci_database_add_command_description: With the following command, you can create your service using our API.
pci_database_add_footer_part_1: All product names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners. All company, product and service names used in this website are for identification purposes only. Use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement.
pci_database_add_footer_part_2: *Redis is a trademark of Redis Ltd. Any rights therein are reserved to Redis Ltd. Any use by OVH SAS  is for referential purposes only and does not indicate any sponsorship, endorsement or affiliation between Redis and OVH SAS.
